group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
So I leave this in the hands of the Tokime Clan.@Please help her.

group_1.textCenter: Serving under Queen Cleopatra,@I was bound to the Met Clan…
I was like a shell of myself, buried.
Then the elders behind the dynasty were gone,@and I was given wings of freedom.
But there was no fountain overflowing@within me.
No matter how much I sought, I found no@moisture. Only the sun, scorching my soul.
And even so, I consider myself to be happy.
I feel lucky to have met Shizuka and the others.
I'm sure that all who came before me are now@in Aaru's paradise.
And now that I am free of my shackles,@I know I am no different.
So all I need to do now is entrust my hope.
Just like how Shizuka and the others saved me…@Bring this hope…to the future to come…
